benchmark_details.name: FoodBench
benchmark_details.overview: FoodBench is a benchmark framework for assessing the capabilities of models that assist food-related decision making.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the utility of cooking-related knowledge bases and models in culinary decision making.

data.source: Various sources including web data, scientific papers, and culinary recipes.
data.annotation: Manual and automated filtering and categorization using language models.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of models evaluated with benchmarks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance of the culinary decision-making systems.
methodology.validation: Validation occurs through empirical evaluations using CookingSense.
